## What

This is the personal portfolio website of Trần Hoàng Huy, showcasing his
Frontend development work, projects, technical skills and career history.

## Technical Skills

Frontend:     ReactJS, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, PHP
Styling:      Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, MUI (Material UI), Hero UI, Ant Design, CSS Modules
State:        Redux Toolkit, Jotai, Context API
Animation:    Framer Motion
Backend:      NestJS, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, JWT Authentication, OAuth 2.0
Databases:    PostgreSQL, TypeORM, Prisma ORM
CMS:          WordPress, Elementor, Strapi
Mobile:       Flutter
DevOps:       Git, GitHub, Vercel
AI Tools:     ChatGPT, Gemini, v0, Lovable

## Work Experience

1. Frontend Intern — TekNix Technology Corporation (Sep 2025 – present)
   Build and optimise websites for international dental clinic clients.
   Stack: ReactJS, Next.js, WordPress, Tailwind CSS, REST API, Framer, SEO.

2. Fullstack Intern — Green Space Solution JSC (Jun 2025 – Aug 2025)
   Contributed to AutoTMS (transport management system): designed UI,
   integrated data modules, and implemented backend features.
   Stack: Next.js, Hero UI, REST API, NestJS, Strapi, Prisma ORM, GraphQL.

3. IT Intern — UTA Co., Ltd (Jun 2024 – Apr 2025)
   Developed an AI-based pest diagnosis feature using PhoBERT (~97% accuracy).
   Optimised web apps for PagoSolution (ReactJS, NestJS, REST API, Tailwind CSS).
   Implemented responsive Figma designs for IECES project using WordPress & Elementor.
   Stack: ReactJS, NestJS, REST API, PhoBERT, Tailwind CSS, WordPress.

## Projects

### DevoseCare Dashboard
- Company: TekNix Technology Corporation
- Period: Feb 02 – Feb 27, 2026
- Role: Frontend Developer
- Tech: ReactJS, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, Zustand, dnd-kit, Axios, React Hook Form, Zod
- Description: Internal management dashboard for DevoseCare medical center.
  Features: Full appointment lifecycle management with Kanban drag-and-drop (dnd-kit),
  customer list management, CMS module for Client App content,
  role-based staff permissions, login/logout.
- Demo: https://devoscare-dashboard.blocktrend.xyz

### E-commerce Farm Platform (Bachelor's Thesis)
- Period: Apr 2025 – Aug 2025
- Role: Fullstack Developer
- Tech: Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, TypeORM, PhoBERT (fine-tuned NLP model)
- Description: AI-powered agricultural e-commerce platform. The AI model predicts
  crop disease names and treatment plans from Vietnamese text with ~97% accuracy.
- Repo: https://github.com/huykg1112/project-ecommerce-farm

### Homestay Booking Web App
- Period: Apr 2024 – Aug 2024
- Role: Frontend Developer (2-member team)
- Tech: ReactJS, NestJS, PostgreSQL, REST API, Tailwind CSS
- Description: Full-stack property booking platform with search, booking flow
  and management features for clients, landlords and admins.
- Repo: https://github.com/tainn03/Homestay-Booking-Client
